document_data.name: Cora Mulphoon
document_data.mainbody: '''Cora Mulphoon''' was the proprietor of the [[Buried Treasures]] inn, which operated in the town of [[Bremen]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: She was described as being middle-aged as of the mid-1480s [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Cora was exceedingly complaisant, personally seeing to any possible need that her guests may have.
document_data.Relationships: Her only known family was her son [[Huarwar Mulphoon|Huarwar]],{{Template:Cite book/Legacy of the Crystal Shard/Campaign Guide|33}}
document_data.History:
Circa the {{yearlinkName|1489}}, Cora's son Huarwar began acting dramatically different following an excursion to bring back Speaker [[Dorbulgruf Shalescar]] after the elder [[dwarf]] wandered off on one his "excursions". He started acting cruel, and almost became violent with his mother, before quickly leaving town for the [[Caer-Dineval keep|keep]] at [[Caer-Dineval]].

Cora was devastated by her son's alarming actions, and began looking for [[adventurer]]s to bring him back safely home.
